document.full_text: taiwan smartphone maker htc corp said on tuesday consolidated sales for may reached t$40.62 billion ($1.42 billion), more than double the same month a year earlier.
document.title: taiwan's htc may sales more than double
lines_and_colors: taiwan smartphone maker htc corp said on tuesday consolidated sales for may reached t$40.62 billion ($1.42 billion), more than double the same month a year earlier.
